column2: The ongoing revolt takes people away from their fields and stores, and the economy suffers as a result
Punish these outlaws!
A bribe may calm them
Young and strong men have been called to arms in the war, and the economy suffers as a result
Every war has its price...
We'll give alms to those who need it
The ongoing epidemic takes healthy people from their fields and storesto care for their sick ones, and the economy suffers as a result
It is God's punishment for their sins!
We'll build a quarantine hospital out of town
The province has been plundered of all goods. The desperate people don't have food or resources anymore, and the economy suffers as a result
Let the fools suffer! It was an expected result…
Empty the wine cellars to relieve the people
A period of relative calm and serenity reigns in a province, and this increases the economy
Peace, jobs and good health for everybody!
A province is wealthy, and among the townsfolk money circulates in abundance
Then they can pay more taxes without harm…
An ugly form of intestinal illness begins among the desperate people of a looted province
Pray for divine pity, but stay your hand!
We'll give them drinkable water to avoid worse
In a besieged province, dangerous symptoms of feverish illness begin among the soldiers and slowly spread to the common people
Pray for celestial mercy, but stay your hand!
Encourage the clergy to take care of the sick
A province is suffering under struggling economic conditions, and the subjects are outraged by the squanderings of the court and by the carelessness that their leader shows toward them
They are ragamuffins and such they will remain!
We'll provide some alms and hope for the best
We'll give bread, jobs and dignity to the people
In a province oppressed by poverty the subjects are furious because their ruler is employing their people in war instead of recruiting mercenary armies
Filthy boors! How dare you rebel?
We'll provide some support and hope for the best
Bread, jobs and dignity for the ones left behind
In a poor province the people's revolt is out of control, and the most violent ones have targetted some of the buildings of your government
They are beasts, let's disperse them!
We'll calm only the more agitated ones
We'll put an end to this revolt
In a poor province the people's revolt is out of control, and the most violent ones have begun a siege on the grand palace
They are beasts, let's disperse them!
We'll calm only the more agitated ones
We'll put an end to this revolt
In a poor province the people are fed up with war, and in a people's revolt which is out of control the most violent ones march on the training grounds
They are beasts, let's disperse them!
We'll calm only the more agitated ones
We'll put an end to this revolt
In a poor province the people are fed up with war, and in a people's revolt which is out of control the most violent ones besiege the war academy
They are beasts, let's disperse them!
We'll calm only the more agitated ones
We'll put an end to this revolt
The law of Royal Preorgatory rules our demesne, but in a province the nobles practice excessive power
All shall have to conform to my laws!
Nothing wrong with slight deviation from the norm
The law of Royal Preorgatory rules our demesne, but in a province the clergy practices excessive power
All shall have to conform to my laws!
Nothing wrong with slight deviation from the norm
The law of Royal Preorgatory rules our demesne, but in a province the burghers practice excessive power
All shall have to conform to my laws!
Nothing wrong with slight deviation from the norm
The law of Royal Preorgatory rules our demesne, but in a province the peasants practice excessive power
All shall have to conform to my laws!
Nothing wrong with slight deviation from the norm
The law of Feudal Contract rules our demesne, and the nobles of a province claim the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
The law of Traditional Custom rules our demesne, and the nobles of a province claim the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
The law of Traditional Custom rules our demesne, and the clergy of a province claims the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
The law of Traditional Custom rules our demesne, and the burghers of a province claim the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
The law of Traditional Custom rules our demesne, and the peasants of a province claim the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
Popular Law rules our demesne, and the burghers of a province claim the power that is theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
Popular Law rules our demesne, and the peasants of a province claim the power that theirs by law
Correct! My laws must be applied!
Exceptions to the laws must also exist…
Taking a stroll through the town around the castle, you feel a strange uneasiness when you come in contact with people who don't share your cultural identity
It's time to enforce the true culture!
Bribe the undesirables to leave
No, tolerance is a value to protect

With the 'Dictatus Papae' the pontiff affirms that the Roman pontiff alone may instate bishops. This is in opposition to the wish of the Holy Roman Empiror, who claims the right of autonomy over nominations.\nAs King of Germany you are excommunicated!
I'll assemble a conclave to elect an antipope!
I immediately will go to Canossa to get pardon
If you will go yourself in peace to Modena, the countess Matildha can intercede with the Pope on your behalf, to ask for revocation of the excommunication
I'll go there humble and penitent and wait

The humiliating pilgrimage of the ruler of the Holy Roman Empire in italic earth has convinced Matildha of Canossa of his repentance.\nThanks to her intercession the Pope has revoked the excommunication!
Yes, but the matter doesn't end here…

The 'Concordat of Worms' has finally enacted the division of the assignments between Church and Holy Roman Empire concerning the nominations of the bishops.\nThe Pope will confer ring and pastoral, the King of Germany province and scepter
My right has finally been recognized!
I will give up up the right to assign bishops
The Church disapproves of your work regarding the bishops' investiture.\nAs king you would like complete autonomy over nominations but you have to defer to the authority of the Pope
I am the only ruler of my demesne!
It is all right, I will follow his decisions
The Pope would like to find a solution regarding the bishops' investiture.\nAs king, if you recognize his authority, he offers to revoke your excommunication
I am the only ruler of my demesne!
All right, I will defer myself to his clemency

Many knights have departed to the search of the Holy Grail, but nobody has returned with the legendary goblet that caught the blood of Christ.\nBut recurrent braggarts tell that it is guarded somewhere in Palestine
They are only foolish popular superstitions
It has been searched for enough in the past!
And if were really my destiny to find it?

Many knights have departed to the search of the Holy Grail, but nobody has returned with the legendary goblet that caught the blood of Christ.\nBut recurrent braggarts tell that it is guarded somewhere in Thrace
They are only foolish popular superstitions
It has been searched for enough in the past!
And if were really my destiny to find it?

Many knights have departed to the search of the Holy Grail, but nobody has returned with the legendary goblet that caught the blood of Christ.\nBut recurrent braggarts tell that it is guarded somewhere in the Champagne
They are only foolish popular superstitions
It has been searched for enough in the past!
And if were really my destiny to find it?

Many knights have departed to the search of the Holy Grail, but nobody has returned with the legendary goblet that caught the blood of Christ.\nBut recurrent braggarts tell that it is guarded somewhere along the shores of the Po
They are only foolish popular superstitions
It has been searched for enough in the past!
And if were really my destiny to find it?

Many knights have departed to the search of the Holy Grail, but nobody has returned with the legendary goblet that caught the blood of Christ.\nBut recurrent braggarts tell that it is guarded somewhere in the eastern Spanish Sierra
They are only foolish popular superstitions
It has been searched for enough in the past!
And if were really my destiny to find it?
To recover the precious relic, it is necessary to finance a journey to where it is said to be hidden, and to search for it with faith!
I will go myself, none shall hold me back!
I will send the marshal, it is more suited
We shall both depart, together we've more chances
It doesn't exist, therefore I won't waste time
Tonight you have dreamt of a suspended knight in the void that grabbed a mystical gilded cup.\nWhat can be the meaning of all of this?
Nothing, it was just the effect of drunkenness!
Look for information in the surrounding area
It was the Grail! It is here! I need to find it!
The people of the area seem to know a precious secret, but are hesitant to reveal it!
Generously spending money may help…
We'll try with a little money and a lot of luck…
Let's leave it be, it is not worth it!
I am sure that the goblet is guarded around here, and I will slay all if it isn't revealed to me!
I will kill all until I have found it!
Let's make a few victims and pray for much luck…
Let's leave it be, it is not worth it!
Sadly the attempt is failed and the search is ended
It is time to think about more wordly matters…
Here it is finally! I have found the Holy Grail!
Or at least such it appears to be…
The Church, although not recognizing the authenticity of it, allows you to display the relic for the veneration of pilgrims in a place of suitable worship
What a great shrine for my lineage!
An outlaw calling himself Robin Hood is molesting the rich to help the poor, and his popularity grows more every day, as does his gang of followers
The clergy is really upset!
Stealing to the nobles is a shame for me!

Because of the continuous robberies of the gang of the outlaw Robin Hood, we raised the income taxes of the province, but many of the simple people don't have any more to pay and they can't fulfill their duties
We'll tax the farmers and countrymen more
The burghers still have some money in their pockets
In a province infested by the robberies of the outlaw Robin Hood, there is need to restore the law by putting large ransoms on the head of the notorious chief-gang and his companions
Let's focus first to defeat the thieves
The smugglers are a scourge
It would be a relief if highway robberies ended
I don't have money to spare for law enforcement!
As a trap to capture the outlaw Robin Hood, a tournament could be organized near Sherwood with a tempting prize for the best archer that will succeed in beating our infallible sheriff
The winner will put to the shame the sheriff
The winner will gain as much gold as he weighs
The winner will gain the hand of the lady Marian
There won't be any stupid and expensive tournament
The conceited sheriff is not such a great archer as all thought!
Even a child would be able to beat him
Next time it will be forbidden for people to fatten themselves up consuming with roast and beers before the competition!
Competitors should be feather-light to play
I must learn to shoot with the bow if I want to have a chance of winning the Lady!
For Lady Marian I would do anything at all…
The trap has worked! I have finally captured the elusive Robin Hood!
History ends, but legend begins…

Peter the Hermit, preaching for the farmers and the simple people of half Europe, has convinced many to participate in the Paupers' Crusade, assuring that God would make them win against the infidels. But almost none of the people that have departed have returned back home
And lands have been left abandoned as a result

The Paupers' Crusade, started by Peter the Hermit, is bringing here to Byzantium thousands of farmers from all over Europe, who desire to march toward Jerusalem. We either have to ferry them over the Bosporus quick, or we will soon have huge problems managing them!
Let's ferry them across now, no matter the cost!
I can't pay now, therefore we hope for the best

The Paupers' Crusade, started by Peter the Hermit, has crossed one of our provinces, but the thousands of people marching toward Jerusalem have come in conflict with our people for futile reasons. The clashes have sown death and devastation in the surrounding countries
Luckily I have quickly prepared an armed garrison!
Foolish fanatics! Have you confused us with Arabs?

The great fairs of the Champagne are a good opportunity for commerce and profit. The merchants can purchase raw cloth, then dye them and resell them elsewhere, while the bookkeepers can deal with all transactions of credit and payment. Do we want to invest in the above?
No, it doesn't interest me at all!
I will encourage the people to participate
I will send some of my own servants there
A large invertment may lead to a huge profit!

The great fairs of the Champagne are a good opportunity for commerce and profit. The spinners can sell the wool and linen suits they produced and buy exotic foods and spices. Do we want to invest in the above?
No, it doesn't interest me at all!
I will encourage the people to participate
I will send some of my own servants there
A large invertment may lead to a huge profit!

The great fairs of the Champagne are a good opportunity for commerce and profit. The farmers can sell wine, liquors and cheeses produced in their farms and buy new suitable garments. Do we want to invest in the above?
No, it doesn't interest me at all!
I will encourage the people to participate
I will send some of my own servants there
A large invertment may lead to a huge profit!

The great fairs of the Champagne are a good opportunity of commerce and profit. Through the 'Road of Santiago' people can go there to sell exotic spices and wheat and buy new linen suits. Do we want to invest in the above?
No, it doesn't interest me at all!
I will encourage the people to participate
I will send some of my own servants there
A large invertment may lead to a huge profit!

The great fairs of the Champagne are a good opportunity of commerce and profit. People and merchants come here from every part of Europe through roads and rivers. There is a need for big warehouses to store and sell the commodities. Do we want to invest in the above?
No, it doesn't interest me at all!
I will encourage the people to participate
I will send some of my own servants there
A large invertment may lead to a huge profit!

The champion Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar, known as 'El Cid Campeador', has learned of the siege in progress and has rushed there offering his help. He is an experienced knight and he is prepared to open a decisive breach in the Moor's defenses to conquer the castle
El Cid is indeed a 'Campeador!'
No, thanks! I am worthy knight myself!

The champion Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar, known as 'El Cid Campeador', has recruited a regiment of faithful men and has offered them for your service. He is feared, respected, and admired by Arabs and Christians alike, and these men will be very useful in the current war against the Moor
Hurray for El Cid, the only true 'Campeador!'
No, I don't want to own him any favours!

The 'Constitutions of Clarendon' have formulated 16 articles that define the legal matters between Church and Crown, limiting the powers of the clergy and restoring impoverished regal rights. The archbishop Thomas Becket refuses the new laws and runs away in exile, but other bishops fold to the will of the sovereign
Let's stop the impunity of the 'criminous clerks'!

The pontifical legacies inform that Pope is ready to excommunicate you if you don't grant permission to Thomas Becket, Archbishop of Canterbury, to return from French exile and take back his function of spiritual guide
Well! Let's fake a reconciliation!
Never! He had my trust but has betrayed it!
Thomas Becket, returned to Canterbury, wants back the possessions forfeited to the Church and has disavowed all the bishops who have made pacts with the sovereign!
Will no one rid me of this troublesome priest?
He can have anything, as long as he leaves me be!

Four armed assassins depart for Canterbury. The archbishop, dressed with the sacred hangings, allows the assassins to stab him in the cathedral without giving any resistance. Three years later Thomas Becket will be proclaimed saint and martyr
I have been wrong! I will kneel on his grave!
One more martyr doesn't make any difference…

The Pope, speaking on the Council of Clermont, has pronounced a vigorous sermon to incite the believers to defend Christianity against the barbarities of the Moslem people. Now he is calling on all Catholic sovereigns still reticent to join the Crusade!
Deus Vult!
If I must, I'll do it to save appearances!
Embrace the cross? I don't see any reason to!

The sovereign has ordered the survey of all England: of all the lands, of all possessions, their habitations, their men's status and living conditions, the possessions of the farms, and of the tax due. The 'Domesday Book' is the account written of these expensive inquiries, and from now on it is law!
Knowing all matters helps to administer better!

Barons and citizens of England clamour at great voice for the 'Magna Carta', the end of the absolute power of the king and the recognition of many of their rights, such as that not to suffer arbitrary taxes and to get fair trials before being imprisoned
Well! They shall have what they desire!
Never! I will not surrender to any request!
The intolerance of the sovereign will bring England to civil war!
I will depart and join with the Barons in revolt!

Bernard of Clairvaux, Cistercian monk and founder of the Rule of the Knights Templars, asks us a contribution to build a monastery in one of our provinces. His oratorical ability, clarity of thought and emphasis on the Virgin Mary attract many converts to his cause
Sorry, but I don't have any money to spend
His abbots can pay the expenses!
Such a pious man deserves every sacrifice
In addition, I want a Templar House

Francis of Assisi, founder of the Franciscan Order, has received papal approval to continue his preachings on poverty, a sober lifestyle, and simple sermons for simple people. His teaching calls many people and rapproaches them to the Church, professing the renouncement of all material possessions
Poverty? Have they all gone crazy?
Money estranges man from God!

The Spaniard Domenico Guzmán, founder of the Order of Preachers, is engulfed in the struggle against the  Albigensian heresy, using as his weapon a rigorous style of life to testify the example fir the Catholic faith. Now he has come here to fulfill his tasks
We don't need him, the heretics shall remain!
Deo gratias! True faith is restored!

Hildegard von Bingen, nun, composer, visionary and healer, is travelling through Germany as a 'Feather on the Breathe of God' to move the minds and consciences of bishops, abbots, and noblemen, and to challenge the authority of the ruler without fear
The 'Viriditas' she professes helps the people
Her visions have the support of the Church
This 'Prophetess' decreases the noble's influence
She has dared to criticize me? I don't care!

The Arabic-Andalusian 'Averroes'(Ibn Achmed), philosopher, astronomer, and writer on Islamic jurisprudence, has translated and commented the works of Aristotle that were mostly forgotten in western Europe. He sustains that Truth can be reached both through religion and through philosophy
The depth of the studies on Aristotle is unique
His medical Encyclopædia is a great resource
His thoughts, nevertheless, undermine the clergy

With his verses on Chivalry Romance, the writer Chrétien de Troyes introduces the histories of Lancelot and Perceval where woman are shown as majestous Ladies, love is a form of homage, and the lover is a subject who, if needed, has to overcome every obstacle with sacrifice of his own life
Welcome the enjoyments and the pleasures of Love!
I disapprove! It distracts men from the church!

Pilgrims and merchants arriving from Byzantium tell with amazement of the 'Mandylion', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. They say that on it there has mysteriously remained engraved a mystical image
Stress of the journey causes strong hallucinations!
I know it well, but I am occupied with other matters
I will depart immediately to see it with my eyes!

Pilgrims and merchants arriving from Lirey tell with amazement of the 'Shroud', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. They say that on it there has mysteriously remained engraved a mystical image
Stress of the journey causes strong hallucinations!
I know it well, but I am occupied with other matters
I will depart immediately to see it with my own eyes!
Seeing the Man on the shroud is an intensely emotional encounter, that cures the body of all ailments and hardships suffered in the trip
And it is indeed a divine revelation!
Interesting! Who is the artist that has painted him?

The Templars have been searching a long time for the 'Mandylion', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. All of traces of it were lost after it was stolen from Byzantium. Its rediscovery would be prestigious in the eyes of the rest of the world!
Good for them, if they will ever succeed us…
Interesting! I will accomodate them in my lands!

The Templars have been searching a long time for the 'Mandylion', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. All of traces of it were lost after it was stolen from Byzantium. Today, during a meeting, they have revealed their assumptions and the plans for its recovery. After having listened to them, what are your thoughts?
They are fanatics, I will not join their cause!
It is probably still guarded in Byzantium…
I am inspired to look for it in Athens…
It is perhaps in Lirey, owned by some French noble…

The Templars have been searching a long time for the 'Mandylion', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. All of traces of it were lost after it was stolen from Byzantium. Today, during a meeting, they have revealed their assumptions and the plans for its recovery. After having listened to them, what are your thoughts?
They are fanatics, I will not join their cause!
It is probably still guarded in Byzantium…
I am inspired to look for it in Athens…
It is perhaps in Lirey, owned by some French noble…

The Templars have been searching a long time for the 'Mandylion', the shroud that is supposed to have wrapped the body of Christ, taken from the cross. All of traces of it were lost after it was stolen from Byzantium. Today, during a meeting, they have revealed their assumptions and the plans for its recovery. After having listened to them, what are your thoughts?
They are fanatics, I will not join their cause!
It is probably still guarded in Byzantium…
I am inspired to look for it in Athens…
It is perhaps in Lirey, owned by some French noble…
Together with the Knights Templars you have gone to the secret place where you believe the 'Mandylion' to be hidden. The trip is long and full of traps, and in the end...
Nothing, it was all for naught!
Together with the Knights Templars you have gone to the secret place where you believe the 'Mandylion' to be hidden. The trip is long and full of traps, and in the end...
A triviality ends up costing you very dear!
Together with the Knights Templars you have gone to the secret place where you believe the 'Mandylion' to be hidden. The trip is long and full of traps, and in the end...
Right place! Now we just have to look for it!
Information gathering reveals to you that a rich and influential Jewish family guards the precious relic in their castle
I have Templars with me! I will demolish the castle!
We will try to steal it, catching them by surprise
I will personally go to bargain over its purchase
I ask permission to see it, and I will return home
Attacking a castle is not as easy as picking flowers, but it is a grave enterprise, dangerous and with an uncertain result!
I have come and am ready to spill my blood!
A different technique could perhaps be found
The assault in the castle is violent and bloody. Tall flames arise from the Great Hall that holds the relic!
Only with great fortune will it be found intact!
To succesfully infiltrate the castle we'll need dexterity and agility, and we should do it unarmed. Nobody is suspicious yet, but the watch is vigilant!
One: climb the walls. If it goes wrong, return home!
Perhaps it is best to reconsider this
The watch has not noticed anything! Now we must infiltrate the tower from the courtyard
Two: raise the gate. If it goes wrong, return home!
The hinges are rusted, we'd better cancel the theft!
They must be deep sleepers not to have noticed all that creaking! Soon, we'll be at the Great Hall!
Three: steal shroud. If it goes wrong, return home!
Detach it from wall and refold it? There's no time!
Damn! People are arriving from the corridors! Hand me the bag with 'Mandylion', I know what I must do!
Out we go, down the window: if wrong, we return home!

You are received with respect, but you find yourself in the presence of wealthy and experienced merchants. It will be difficult to make an agreement on a reasonable price, since you will have to deal with their crafty treasurer!
I offer 1000 pieces of gold. Are they enough?
Why spend money? Let's return and think it over!
The gold has been cashed by the treasurer quickly, but it will be sufficient to complete the purchase?
More gold? Knights, don't let me pay it alone!
No, we risk bankruptcy! Let's change tactics!
The avarice of this family doesn't have an equal even among the leeches!
They dream money while are sleeping!
Faced such expenses, the Knights don't stay indifferent!
One hand on the cross, the other in the purse!
I am worn-out!  I have given all the money that I had with me, the horse, and even the armor!
If all this is not enough, I will return home afoot!
The 'Mandylion' research has failed! Let's go home!
We have had bad luck…

The 'Mandylion' has finally been brought back to the light! As reward for the abnegation that you have shown, the Grand Master of the Templars entrusts it in custody of you and your descendants until 1356, when it will be transferred to Lirey
As history demands!
While wandering the countries of your lands, you notice an 11-year-old shepherd who is drawing the figure of a sheep above a rock with chalk
He keeps himself busy while watching over the flock
I will wait until he finishes, looking to the sketch…
I could enroll him in the workshop of Cimabue…
What skill! That shepherd is Giotto di Bondone, who will become a famous painter and architect, and be considered the precursor of the Italian Renaissance!
It is prestigious to discover an admirable artist!

The master Giotto di Bondone, first painter to use perspective instead of the usual flat figures, famous for his paintings in Assisi, Padua and Florence, is travelling through our parts during his ongoing journey
I'll pay you to decorate the Palace of Justice!
I'll pay you to add frescoes to the church!
I hope you'll appreciate the area and good kitchens…

The German Gottfried von Strassburg's rewrites of the famous history of Tristan and Isolde have become very popular. The story of the unlucky lovers is superb and captures whoever listen to it, but it certainly does not have the favour of the zealous clergy!
Literature must be encouraged, not repressed!
It must be censored from the public immediately

The spread of the Nibelungenlied, the epic poem by an anonymous poet, is establishing German culture under the nobles. The epic of Siegfried and the endless struggle between good and evil provokes passionate feelings and an identification with the German cause
Cultural unity strengthens loyalty!

The Alexiad is the first history treatise written by a woman, Anna Comnena, completed during exile in convent. The spread of the work, that tells the political and military epic of her father, Byzantine Emperor, also puts the current government in good light
Welcome Anna! What an honour for my empire!

Nicetas Choniates, politician and writer, has written the history of the Byzantine empire of the last century. Although his work does not always praise the previous emperors nor the acts of the Orthodox Church, it puts the current occupant of the throne in good light
This is too much honour!
How dare he criticize my predecessors?
How dare he criticize the patriarchs?

Geoffrey of Monmouth has completed his work 'Historia Regum Britanniae', an epic and fanciful account of the life of the British kings of the past 2000 years, starting with Brutus, descendant of Aeneas of Troy, and continuing to and beyond Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
This is a great boon for the English Crown!

Stephen of Cloyes, a twelve year-old shepherd and leader of the 'The Children's Crusade', has promised to his followers that the seas will part for of as the Red Sea did for Moses, and that they would be able to walk to Palestine. Thousands of boys are on the sea shores, waiting for the miracle now. What can we do?
Embark them on ships and sell them as slaves!
Send them to their homes on my expenses!
The ruler has been poisoned! Without doubt it is a conspiracy!
A bad reputation creates many enemies…
BOPACK AI EVENT
To avoiding ugly surprises, you should check the loyalty of your vassals, as voices are raised that one of them doesn't support your personal war at all, and he would like to have his army back home!
Perhaps I should return his the soldiers…
BOPACK AI EVENT
A disloyal vassal has taken back his army and has declared independence from you sending a message\n'Felon, fight YOUR wars alone!'
This shame must be washed away with blood!

With a Papal bull, the Pontiff demands all Catholic rulers waging war on their fellows to lay down the weapons. He guarantees the indulgence for sins committed during the fratricidal conflicts, and confirms that the only true enemies are people who don't profess the One True Faith
If the Pope wants it, God wants it!
A bull? Yes, it sure is…
The matter of indulgences is not quite resolved!
I have understood, it's matter of offering…
This time I won't even pay a gramme of gold!
The Pope disapproves of those who don't follow his directives!
I have understood, it's matter of offering…
This time I won't even pay a gramme of gold!
The Pope has prepared another bull, a great and serious matter, that concerns yourself a lot!
No! Stop the bull! Here is the due offering…
Amen! I will follow first bull to avoid worse…
If the bull arrives, I will burn it!
Currently the ruler enjoys a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a true knight
Yes, but this does not mean it will last forever!
Currently the ruler doesn't enjoy a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he doesn't really appear to be a proper knight
The humours change with the tide…
Currently the ruler enjoys a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a true knight
Yes, but this does not mean it will last forever!
Currently the ruler doesn't enjoy a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he doesn't really appear to be a proper knight
The humours change with the tide…
Currently the ruler has a bad reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a bad example of a knight
Everyone has to learn to fear me!
Currently the ruler has a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a redeemed knight
The character tempers itself as does the sword!
Currently the ruler has a bad reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a bad example of a knight
Everyone has to learn to fear me!
Currently the ruler has a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a redeemed knight
The character tempers itself as does the sword!
Currently the ruler has a very bad reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a merciless knight
Trouble happens to whom hinders my footsteps!
Currently the ruler has a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he appears is redeemed knight
The character tempers itself as does the sword!
Currently the ruler has a horrible reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a knight of evil
Torment is the whip of existence!
Currently the ruler has a good reputation, and in the eyes of the common people he is a redeemed knight
The character tempers itself as does the sword!

A courtier you trust, tired of the humiliation to serve a lord who doesn't enjoy a good reputation among his peers at all, is preparing to move elsewhere and to do his duties for someone with better reputation than you
I send him into a prison, eating bread and water!
Money can take away a lot of bitterness…
If he wants to leave, the door is open…
None can be better than I!
Because nobody could be worse…
Every person has his price!
And money can also buy loyalty…
Nobody can afford to spit in the dish where he eats!
I will give his soup to whom has more hunger…
Strange people are wandering threateningly outside the castle, and there is a chance that someone may break in at night supported by the bands of criminals that are present in the capital
Nobody goes to steal in the thieves home!
I will enforce the guard to avoid bad surprises
I'm sure it's a conspiracy by a rival of mine!
It's time to definitively fight against my rival!

The religious divisions in Christianity instigate hate and mutual intolerance among the various confessions. For some reasons, someone could foment the persecution against those who are not Catholic, as we are. Recently strange and threathening people have been spotted outside the castle
Who could be against our Belief?
I will enforce the guard to avoid bad surprises
I'm sure it's a conspiracy by a rival of mine!
It's time to definitively fight against my rival!

The Pope continually pronounces vigorous anathemas against all nobles who have denied the true faith and have embraced heresy. For some reasons, someone could be interested to act on the Papal threats, and, recently, strange and threathening people have been spotted outside the castle
They will learn the Truth of the new doctrine!
I will enforce the guard to avoid bad surprises
I'm sure it's a conspiracy by a rival of mine!
It's time to definitively fight against my rival!

Your excommunication brands you as a criminal and banishes you from the assembly of the Catholic world. For some reasons, someone could stage a claim on your properties and, recently, strange and threathening people have been spotted outside the castle
Who would molest an outcast like me?
I will enforce the guard to avoid bad surprises
I'm sure it's a conspiracy by a rival of mine!
It's time to definitively fight against my rival!
Someone saw dangerous shadows trought the corridors tonight!
Damn! They were hired assassins!
A courtier has been attacked at midnight!
We should increase the guard…
Someone saw dangerous shadows trought the corridors tonight!
Damn! They were hired assassins!
The ruler has been attacked at midnight!
We should increase the guard…
Damned thieves! Gold sacks, silver wares and jewels have disappeared from the castle!
They will need days to count the loot!
Felon, I got fresh mercenaries. Come here if you have courage!'
I'm waiting for you!
The burden of the years begins to weak your physical and moral, and perhaps it's time to pass the sceptre of power to your heir
I'll buy a castle for my last days and abdicate
No, only death will separate me from command!
Your father's health is seriously compromised, the demesne needs an efficient guide and you are the legitimate heir. Do you want to accelerate the succession?
Forgive me, father, but politic has its reasons!
No, only God will give me the command!
The ruler has health and power in abundance, then your succession as legitimate heir doesn't seem immediately at all. Do you think you can wait your turn so long?
At night unforeseen tragic events often occur…
I need someone doing the dirty job!
Only God will give me the command!
The plot must result an unfortunate accident!
A horse downfall provoked by the Marshal
A wall collapse caused by Spymaster
A poisoned cup of wine furnished by Chancellor
A stairs fall due to the Steward treasure chest

The lack of male heirs is a sorrow that often bothers you, frustrating the dream of becoming a playful dad that amuses his children before the good night's kiss. You must find a remedy for the low scarce fertility that prevents you from procreating
I could resort to black magic
The alchemist deals in aphrodisiac potions
I will have my wife sleep with another
Patience! A relative will continue the dynasty

The lack of male heirs is a sorrow that often bothers you, frustrating the dream of becoming a playful dad that amuses his children before the good night's kiss. You must find a remedy for the low scarce fertility that prevents your wife from procreating
I could divorce her and remarry
A bastard with a maid is better than nothing
A fiery 'stallion boy' will cure her frigidity
Patience! A relative will continue the dynasty
A courtier, without duties and without marriage ties, has gotten tired sitting idle at court and he has expressed the desire to move elsewhere
Courtiers here do only what I decide for them!
You will remain behind, counting your new money…
Good trip and good fortunes!
How much must I spend on my courtiers!
Sooner or later I'll provide work for everyone…
A young damsel, still a single woman, would like to find an husband before it is too late
You're shameless! Withdraw in your lodgings!
I think I can remedy part of the problem…
Look for a husband elsewhere with my blessings!
The ruler intends to practice his 'ius primae noctis' on you!'
My virility doesn't have peer! Submit yourself!
I can instruct you in the art and secrets of love…
Considering matters, is better you go elsewhere
After a night of the violence comes a day of shame!
Despicable man, how could you have done this?
I prefer departing rather than seeing you again!
Goodbye animal! May God punish you!
Your crime has not passed unnoticed!
Despite all, I would do it again…
God's punishment arrives!
Accursed witch! I have contracted syphilis…
The fruit of your sin will follow you forever!
I'll tell everyboby you have left him behind…
What marvelous nights, a season of guilt!
But it was foolish not to consider consequences…
The fruit of pleasure becomes an unforeseen event!
It doesn't matter, I will care for him…
Alas, in my position I cannot compromise myself!
With regrets, our affair must end here…
Rather than 'passion' I would call it 'extortion!'
The lovers are sweet and expensive leeches…
My place is no longer between these walls
Only God knows if I can return one day…
Although a promising appointment untill now, a young cadet has proven to be entirely inadequate to continue military training because of his lack of virility
By now it is too late, settle for least results
There is still time to instruct him at court
In a monastery he will certainly find his vocation
Although a promising appointment untill now, a young courtier has revealed himself entirely inadequate to continue training at court because of his clear personal gaps
Let's be satisfied with a future charlatan
He will become a 'hole in my pocket…'
In a training camp there is a way of tempering him
In a monastery he will certainly find his vocation
Although a promising appointment untill now, a young clergyman has revealed himself entirely inadequate to continue his religious formation because of his doubtful personal rectitude
Even as a hermit he will eventually make converts
In a training camp there is a way of tempering him
We are still in time to instruct him at court
Although a promising appointment untill now, a young courtier has revealed herself entirely inadequate to continue her formation at court because of her clear personal gaps
Let's be satisfied with a future charlatan
She will become a 'hole in my pocket…'
In a monastery she'll certainly find her vocation
Although a promising appointment untill now, a young acolyte has revealed herself entirely inadequate to continue her religious formation because of her doubtful personal rectitude
Even as a hermit she will eventually make converts
We are still in time to instruct her at court
While crossing a disputed territory with your army, a gang of outlaws ambushes you when, unwisely, you risk yourself accompanied with just a few men following you
It's better to surrender, and treat with them…
Perhaps, spurring the horses, we can fly away…
A noble is worth ten outlaws, charge!
You are captured, stripped of your armor, and locked away in the hide-out of the criminals!
The treasury will pay 500 gold for my release!
I can pay only a part of what you demand
You ask for the moon! Nobody will pay for me!
The treasury pays the whole required sum!
A huge effort for a just cause…
The treasury pays only 150 of the required gold sum
Perhaps this money will go waste…
A wide cliff stands in the way of your escape from the criminals!
The ground is unstable, there is some risk…
I'd better desist and surrender to the bandits
Never! I will fight them as a true knight!
You have thrown your heart beyond the fear, but finally you are safe!
Next time I'll be more careful…
These scoundrels will now taste the implacable fury of the brave knights!
I will fight valiant up to my death!
They are far too numerous, there is no hope…
They know not the meaning of pity!
I would have preferred to be buried, at least…
While you are leading the army, a wandering regiment of Arabic mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are leading the army, a wandering regiment of Iberian mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are leading the army, a wandering regiment of French mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are guiding the army, a wandering regiment of Saxon mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are guiding the army, a wandering regiment of Germanic mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are guiding the army, a wandering regiment of Slavic mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are guiding the army, a wandering regiment of Nordic mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are guiding the army, a wandering regiment of Mongol mercenaries challenges you in a provocative way
Courageous men, advance and exterminate everybody!
I will face their commander in a duel…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
While you are sailing in open sea, a wandering fleet of Saracen pirates outlines on the horizon, ready to board you
Order your fleet to prepare for the attack!
I immediately will board their flagship…
They are mercenaries, therefore they have a price…
Victory! God was on our side!
Collect the booty and go on…
500 gold coins are a good way to resolve the dispute!
What's bad, however, is I'll have to pay for them…
Naked earth will feed itself with the blood of your brave soldiers!
Their souls will shake your nighttime dreams…
You have completed your duty up to the ultimate sacrifice!
Honour will be my companion in the grave…
Victory! Wind and sea were propitious!
Collect the booty and go on…
The blue depth will be the grave of your brave sailors!
Their sacrifice will torment your sleep…
A funeral at sea is not the best one for a knight!
But your courage will be celebrated back home…

While you are crossing the lands of the Saracens, local peoples spontaneously assemble numerous armies, determined to prevent you with their weapons from continuing your war against their Moslem brothers
God is with us, death to the infidels!
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…

While you are crossing the lands of the pagans, local peoples spontaneously assemble numerous armies, determined to prevent you with their weapons from continuing your war against their pagan brothers
God is with us, death to the infidels!
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…
While you are crossing Jewish provinces, local peoples spontaneously assemble numerous armies, determined to prevent you with their weapons from continuing your war against their Jewish brothers
God is with us, death to the Christ-killers!
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…
While you are crossing orthodox lands, local peoples spontaneously assemble numerous armies, determined to prevent you with their weapons from continuing your war against their orthodox brothers
God is with us, death to the schismatics!
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…
While you are crossing Catholic lands, local peoples spontaneously assemble numerous armies, determined to prevent you with their weapons from continuing your war against their brothers in baptism
God is with us, death to the schismatics!
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…
Give orders to the army to prepare themselves to fight!
I'll go ahead, so I will encourage the soldiers…
I'll stay back, so I will command them better…
I must quickly secure peace…
I give myself up as a hostage, my army will go on…
Peace requiring 200 gold is never painless!
However we have spared a lot of human lives…
The destiny of a prisoner is always unknown!
Paying a 500 gold ransom, I will save my life!
If I survive the tortures I'll be free, at least…
The only hope is to try an unlikely escape…
The frightened people of the village spread rumours about a mysterious and fierce animal wandering the lands around the castle, sowing death and destruction with fiery breath
I do not believe such beasts can exist…
I will pay the best hunters to get rid of it!
I will let the marshal handle the problem…
I will face this unlikely monster myself!
A mysterious wreckage is found in the waters at the edge of the realm, and it is rumoured to have a fabulous treasure in its hold.
I don't know how to swim, so I'll pass this by
I'll jump right in and bring it back up!
A gang of criminals scorches the lands unmolested because no noble knight dares face the brigands
There are no heroes in this castle!
Leave the heroics to the valiant ones: here I come!
A criminal band has set up on the main roads, demanding tolls from any passerbys
It is time to enforce the law!
All in all, nobody is really hurt…
A highway robber band has attacked a caravan carrying goods and a courtier, and now a ransom is demanded for her freedom and return of the items
Sorry, you'll have to take care of yourself…
She's a faithful servant, and deserves my help
Contagious deaths, symptom of an epidemic that spreads through the land, have harshly struck the population. Herbs for the sick are immediately needed, before is too late!
Anything to help my people
Only the strong deserve to survive
The moneylender that supported the cultivation of your lands has come for his agreed share of the money made by the farmers in your service
The harvest was bad, I can't pay you know!
He has earned his reward
A group of noble and brave knights en route for the Holy Land asks for your hospitality
Certainly, make yourselves at home!
You are with too many! Go to another lord
Our land is become overrun by wild growth of trees, and the buildings are threathened unless the forest is cut down
Sacrifices are necessary to preserve the landmarks
Who cares about buildings, all glory to nature!
Tournaments are festive and glorious, but also tiring and expensive
Fortunately I am in perfect health!
The money is better spent in the court
Your wive loves to ride outside the castle, and wants you to pursue and catch her
She's beautiful, but I can't play every day...
Let the 'hunt' begin!
Your child is cuddled and gets a lot of attention from everyone, but if this continues the child will be spoiled
It does not matter, he'll outgrow it as an adult
Enough! Do they want him to grow soft?
Last night you dreamt of a rain of money which fills your realm's coffers. What can it mean?
That soon I'll become rich without lifting a finger!
It's just a dream! I must work for my money!
In the court stables a magnificent white stallion awaits a great rider which can tame his wild temperament
It takes a steady wrist to tame a future champion
I am not a stable-hand!
Sometimes it would be a good idea to take census of all you own, to check what is missing and which expenses can be cut
I don't think so! Taking census is extremely boring!
That is true, and it is time to count...
A group of Arab traders wish to sell you rare spices, but someone who speaks their language is needed if we want a fair price
Good, I'll negotiate a bargain price myself!
Sorry, no time to deal with merchants...
Ever since youth, you liked to prove your courage by climbing the highest tower
I am still the best and will prove it!
Good memories, but I can no longer take those risks
Wine stored in the open might spoil if left by itself, due to seasonal influences
It does not matter, it is great wine no matter what
Wine is stored best in well-cared for wine cellars
During a hunt you have suddenly fainted, and collapsed to the ground. The courtiers worry what to do.
I will immediately take a period of rest
It is just a heat spell, continue the hunt!
A group of enemies has laid siege to a castle of a noble in your family's lands, and the soldiers defending the castle need reinforcements
I will recruit an army to rescue women and childs
I don't care, let the enemy take the place
After nightfall, the cold temperature on the castle walls are quite uncomfortable for the soldiers in your watch
With all that they cost me they dare complain?
I'll buy them warm clothes to keep out the cold
Your steward informs you many subjects refuse to pay taxes, claiming they are too poor to contribute to your funds
Times are hard, I understand
Who does not pay will be hanged!
All the people are interested in a witches trial, where the accused are charged with sacriledge
Burn the witch on the fire as a warning to all!
Let her free and stop this farce!
Our bishop tells of a vision of the Madonna, Her Child, and the Angels, requesting places of worship to be built in our lands
Chase away this drunkard and his visions!
So be it, but only because I fear the wrath of God!
It's a sign, do as the Lord wants!
The pope is restoring his great basilica, and requests you contribute to the work
God demands I support the Pope!
Allright, but I expect an indulgence in return!
I have no money, let providence provide the alms!
Our bishop's sermons are succesful under the people, and many assemble to listen to his illustrous words
Go and preach of my piety for the Lord!
I will finance him, so he can do more good work
A true holy man preaches of absolute poverty and the giving away of all possessions
I will entertain him here, so we can speak of God...
Poor man, he must have been hit in the head!
The merchant caravans have not come for a long time now, and the stores are becoming empty
Time has come to sell our supplies for a lot of gold!
Lets sell our supplies for normal prices
A nun who cares for the sick and needly knocks on our door, asking support for her mission
Noble sister, I will share my wealth
Sorry, I've already given all I have to the Pope
Rummaging through and old trunk which belonged to your ancestors, you have found a manuscript of unknown importance
Let's sell it off as an antiquity and get some money
Let's keep it, it might be worth a fortune
A specialist in manuscripts identifies the manuscript as having belogned to Charlemagne!
It's a family treasure and I'll keep it!
It's worth a fortune, and I can use the money
Your wife's ambitions are great, and not a day goes by without her berating you for not increasing your lands
She's right, but I can't do as she wants
For you, my dear, I will do great deeds
An artist could paint a tapistry for your halls in which you are depicted as a fearless commander, in the midst of battle
Make sure it looks exactly like me, I beg you!
I am not at all the type for such bragging
On the day of your patron saint, all the people take part in the pilgrimage to the chapel, and you arrive there as well
I will go among the people and invoke his grace
I will go at the head, before the statue even
You've known for some time that your child likes to sketch, spending whole days drawing his pets on the walls
My child, painting just isn't your field!
One day you'll be a famous artist
The frantic commercial activities in your lands call for the installment of money lenders on our grounds
They're welcome, they'll benefit the economy
Usury is an evil which must be eradicated!
An ancient document belonging to your family asserts that your dynasty is the rightful ruler of some bordering lands
Ignore it, it was extorted with force
Occasion has come to claim what is rightfully ours!
You have caught a servant who was stealing fresh bread from the kitchens, and have locked him away in the dungeons
A day with my jailers will teach him a lesson
Let him free, the arrest will be frighting enough
Your child is terrified of the fable of the black rider who abducts unruly children from their homes
He doesn't exist, it was a lie to make you behave
You are so disobedient the knight will certainly come!
A noble in your court claims your title was bought by a remote ancestor for 4 goats, 1 cow, and 2 types of cheese....
Revoke this noble's title and burn him on the stake!
Drunkards tell very foolish tales
Because of disobedience you have confined your wife away from the castle. Is it now time to end this punishment?
Yes, my life is worthless without her
I have some convenience to let her segregated…
Our bishop has been attacked and wounded while performing his religious duty by two of your men. What shall we do?
I want these criminals to be severely punished!
Forgive them, as the bishop preaches....
Apparently your marshall was attacked and robbed last night in the castle corridors. If this is true, it is a cause of worry!
Unfortunately it's true, but I'll find the guilty ones
No, he fell off the stairs because he was drunk...
It's a ploy by that liar! Away with him!
We have to decide wether or not to lower the gate of the drawbridge at night, as the people of the town could enter castle's courtyard producing noise
A bit of confusion will make the night more cheerful…
Always lower the gate! No noise, please!
The castle gates are crossed every day by groups of soldiers, so they can ride in the surrounding lands
I am certain everything is in order
I have given them order to remain in form
In the castle halls you notice that your courtiers tend to assemble in small groups, and fall silent whenever they notice you
They are just talking, and are quiet out of respect
The ingrates are plotting against me!
During your usual walk through your lands a young shepherdess notices your chivalrous splendor
I am a true knight, and respect the gentler sex
As the saying goes, nothing wagered nothing gained!
Your passionate wife drains a lot of you during the nightly extasy, as you'd expect of a happily married couple
None too disturbing, but in the morning I am beat...
Be still my dear! I have a realm to take care off
The marshall's wife throws herself at your feet all the time, wishing loving attention from you that her husband denies her
What can I say... I am a man of healthy principles!
He is faithful to me... I should be the same
The Red Lady is a fascinating and mysterious lady, who often allows you to exchange the realm's funds for some of the more secluded male pleasures
Thanks to my gold this prey will be mine tonight!
She's a devilish creature! Resist the temptation...
Our feud is crossed by a trail where pilgrims walk through on daily basis, but many of them fall exhausted by fatigue
Block the passage to these unnecessary wayfarers
Such pain deserves a little sweat refreshments
You have just found a jewelry suitcase that your grandmother had hidden and which everyone had lost track after her death
Exactly what the Treasure desperately needs!
I'll buy a nice surprise to my wife
The most glaring jewel will be for my spouse
Giving all to my wife I'll gain nights of madness!
The marshal is furious against a young servant, because he had broken his precious sword, companion of many battles
Nobody can punish a boy!
I dislike to dispute with my soldiers…
Chaplain has strongly criticised you because you went in the knights arena instead of to participate at the holy rite
I'll go to him as a penitent sheep
I want to win next tournament at any cost!
Courtiers were surprised by an evocative painting suddenly appeared in a stunning exhibition on a wall of the party hall
I spent years of hard work to finish it secretly!
Now I say stop to the worldliness at court!
At court there are ladies employed in the weaving work that gladly will make friendship with a brilliant knight
A pleasant conversation enforces the spirit
It's unnecessarily wasted breath at all!

column1: # Solmyr's events collected from SMACK by Ambrox

column2: Ruler kills his own wife in a fit of madness
Die!
Mad ruler lusts insatiably after his subjects' wives
Mine, all mine!
Mad ruler executes subjects en masse
Let all these traitors die!
Ruler kills his own son in a fit of madness
Die!
Maniac - Misogynistic behavior
I hate women!
Maniac - Character refuses to leave his bedroom
I'm scared!
Maniac - Religious obsession
God is the greatest!
Maniac - Period of mental clarity
My mind feels clear...
Maniac - Period of mental recession
I don't feel so good...
Young ruler is presured by courtiers
They all have their agenda
Your son is interested in other boys
Nothing can be done
Disown him
Ruler is forced to abdicate
Resist the usurpers!
Abdicate peacefully
Character gains experience
I am older, but wiser
Character gains experience
I am older, but wiser
Character gains experience
I am older, but wiser
Character suffers effects of age
Old age is catching up with me
Character suffers effects of age
Old age is catching up with me
Character thinks about faith
Reflect upon your life
Faith is overrated
Dynasty establishes itself
Claim the throne for my dynasty
Keep the old succession laws
Feudalism takes root
Institute feudalism
Increase royal power instead
Leave things as they are
Royal power increases
Increase royal power
Leave things as they are
Salic Law
Institute Salic Law
Keep the old succession laws
Rise of the Ottomans
Your chaplain guides by example
He is a holy man
Your chaplain's piety influences your standing
He is a holy man
Your chaplain's impiety hurts your standing
He is a faithless man
Your chaplain denounces carnal pleasures
Yes, carnal pleasures are a sin
Bah, what harm could come from it?
Your chaplain's indulgent behavior is drawing condemnation
He likes wild orgies too much...
Your chaplain's religious views are coming into conflict with official dogma
He is arguing against the religious establishment
Your chaplain's heresy is drawing ire towards you!
Exile him
His teachings are true!
Your chaplain urges you to take the Cross!
Deus Vult!
Pff!
Your chaplain is a little too zealous in burning heretics and infidels
Let him do his work
Stop these atrocities
Your chaplain generously distributes the realm's treasury for alms
Let him do this good work
Forbid him to do it
Your chaplain is a little too greedy in collecting indulgences and tithes
I am sure it is all going to the Church...
Your judgment is required in a legal case
Rule justly
Favor your friends
Maintain a middle ground
Pass judgment on a criminal
Punish them harshly
Let them get off scot-free
Punish them fairly
Heralds ask about your ancestry
Make things up in your favor
Answer honestly
Give a neutral answer
Manage the realm
Take an active hand in governing
Let others handle things
Do as much as is needed
Punish the kinsmen of disloyal lords
Execute them!
Grant them pardon
Exile them
Aid the poor
Help them as much as you can
Send out the tax collectors instead
Let them help themselves
The finer things in life
Enjoy the finer things in life
Maintain a temperate lifestyle
Maintain a regular court
In the company of your peers
Carry yourself modestly
Carry yourself haughtily
Carry yourself with dignity
Dealing with matters of state
Let your feelings guide you
Let your reason guide you
Maintain a balanced approach
Dealing with your court
Trust no-one but yourself
Trust your advisors implicitly
Maintain a balanced level of trust
Creation of the Assassins
Management of the Assassin stronghold
Assassination of enemies
The Assassins have struck at us!
Oh no!
Assassination of enemy ruler
Our ruler has been murdered by the Assassins!
Oh no!
Turkoman reinforcements
Creation of the Rum Sultanate
Mameluke rebellion
Rise of the Almohads
Expel the Jews from this province
Expel the Jews and seize their property
Let them stay
Local townsmen are organizing pogroms against the Jews
Ignore it
Stop them
Help them
Crusaders passing through your province are attacking the Jews
Let them do it
Stop them
Extort money from the Jews
Let them share their wealth
Allow them to keep their possessions
It is time to pay an old debt to a Jewish banker
He can wait a while longer
Very well, I will pay this off
Our dynasty strengthens its position
Claim the throne for my dynasty
It is too risky
The Princes are jockeying for power
Rein them in
We are powerless
Let us claim the Imperial throne
It is mine!
Your son is deformed and unfit to rule the Empire
A future Emperor must be perfect
Ignore the tradition, he is my son
Our disregard for tradition is costing us!
That tradition is silly anyway
Rise of the landed aristocracy
Oh well
Try to keep them down
Sale of offices to local aristocrats
Sell the offices
Find other ways to raise money
Ecumenical Council convenes
Look for able clergymen to serve you
Advance your favored theological positions
Secure election of your allies as bishops
Defer to the Patriarch on theological points
Confiscation of Church property
Confiscate Church property to aid the Empire
It is not ours to take
A prominent philosopher is in conflict with Church dogma
Give your patronage to the philosopher
Support the Church doctrine
A burning theological question requires your arbitration
Support traditional dogma
Support an innovative view
Try to find a middle ground
Finance architectural works
Build new palaces
Build new churches and monasteries
Look into new architectural styles
Coinage debasement
Debase the coinage
Maintain the value of our currency
Trade concessions to Italian merchants
Grant them trade concessions
Don't let the leeches profit from our people
Foreign merchants are becoming too impetuous
Arrest and expel them
Do nothing
Italian trade
Your marshal is becoming too powerful
Do nothing
Try to reduce his influence
Depose and exile him
This is costing us prestige!
What can I do?
Your marshal claims your throne!
Try to arrest and execute him
Exile him
Bribe him
Fight him off
We have to bribe our marshal
I hope he doesn't turn against me
Norman sellswords
Let us hire them!
No we don't need them!
Norman sellswords
Let us hire them!
No we don't need them!
Norman sellswords
Let us hire them!
No we don't need them!
Norman sellswords
Let us hire them!

Your liege’s ruling law is radically different from yours. He is gently encouraging you to conform to his way of doing things. What should we do, my lord?
column3: La loi de votre seigneur est radicalement différente de la vôtre. Il vous encourage doucement à adopter sa façon. Que devons-nous faire?
column4: Das Gesetz Eures Lehnsherren unterscheidet sich grundsätzlich von dem Euren. Er bestärkt Euch darin, die Gesetze zu harmonisieren.
column5: Las leyes de tu señor son radicalmente diferentes a las tuyas. Él te está sugiriendo amablemente que te adaptes a su manera de hacer las cosas. ¿Qué debemos hacer mi señor?
column6: La legge di governo del tuo signore è radicalmente differente dalla tua. Egli ci invita ad uniformarci al suo indirizzo. Cosa facciamo?

column2: Good idea, lord!
column6: Il signore ha avuto una buona idea!

column2: No, I shall rule this land as I always have
column3: Non, je règnerai comme je l'ai toujours fait!
column4: Nein, ich werde mein Land so regieren wie immer
column5: No, gobernaré estas tierras como siempre lo hice
column6: No, continuerò a governare come ho fatto finora
